sentences.en: Children’s TV nowadays is much more entertaining.
sentences.cn: 如今的儿童电视节目要比过去有趣多了。

sentences.en: Entertaining in style needn't mean spending lavishly.
sentences.cn: 待客隆重并不意味着要大肆铺张。

sentences.en: Entertaining people is the most natural thing in the world for her.
sentences.cn: 招待客人对她来说是世界上最自然不过的事情.

sentences.en: He loves entertaining his friends with ribald stories.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢用下流故事来逗他的朋友们开心.

sentences.en: He was a much more entertaining person, who used to have us all in fits.
sentences.cn: 他以前更为风趣，常常让我们大家都捧腹大笑。

sentences.en: I don't like to entertain guests anymore.
Miro is the most inventive and entertaining of surrealist painters.
sentences.cn: 米罗是最具创造力和娱乐性的超现实主义画家。

sentences.en: Thank you for a most entertaining magazine, which I read avidly each month.
sentences.cn: 感谢你们把杂志编得如此有趣，我每个月都如痴如醉地阅读。

sentences.en: The book is too long but, nonetheless, informative and entertaining.
sentences.cn: 这本书篇幅太长，但是很有知识性和趣味性。

sentences.en: The great disparity between the teams did not make for an entertaining game.
sentences.cn: 两队实力悬殊,所以比赛并不精彩.

sentences.en: The job involves a lot of entertaining.
sentences.cn: 这项工作需要经常设宴招待客人。

sentences.en: The others seemed to find my discomfort hugely entertaining.
sentences.cn: 我觉得很尴尬,其他人却似乎觉得这非常有趣.

sentences.en: The talk was both informative and entertaining.
sentences.cn: 这次谈话既长见识又饶有趣味。

sentences.en: This is a surprisingly entertaining film.
sentences.cn: 这部电影的娱乐性十足，让人意想不到。

sentences.en: This is actually a very entertaining book putting over serious health messages.
sentences.cn: 这实际上是一本非常有趣的书，讲述了大量的健康知识。

sentences.en: This is an entertaining yet thought-provoking film.
sentences.cn: 这部电影令人捧腹，却又发人深省。

sentences.en: Two well-matched sides conjured up an entertaining game.
sentences.cn: 双方势均力敌，奉献了一场精彩的比赛。

trans.tran_cn: 款待，使快乐（entertain的现在分词）
